attributes.review: First off, I am trying to donate to the campaign and I cannot shake this feeling of someone with a scarily orange skin tone is staring at me. This app gives me the creeps! After downloading this app I’m reconsidering voting for trump in this next election. Do better. 🧚🏻
attributes.title: This app.. no

attributes.review: This app was just absolutely horrible. From the way it is design to what it is trying to spread I......I can’t. Please just delete it. Its was slow and it was just trash.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible

attributes.review: This app’s quality is horrible, it glitches my phone and there are some words are spelled incorrectly. I think you should just throw away the whole app
attributes.title: Useless

attributes.review: First of all, I see a slogan saying “Keep America Great” like what do you mean? U RUINED IT. Second of all it opens up to an orange, and I was super confused about that cause I thought this was supposed to be an app for a president not food.....................TERRIBLE
attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible

attributes.review: When I opened this app the first picture it showed me was a picture of a screaming obese orange man... it scared me so bad that I went into cardiac arrest. Apparently the Cheeto dude is the most powerful man in America? Idk why they would do that he’s an actual idiot.
attributes.title: Mad Cheeto😡😡

attributes.review: Got app for updates on latest rally news but when I opened the app there was nowhere to buy merchandise for my personal collection. Shame
attributes.title: Updates

attributes.review: first off, when i opened the app i saw an naked orange getting spray tanned🤢 my poor grandma was walking by and had a heart attack and died! my poor gram grams last sight before she died was a naked cheeto😭 this app is horrible. never never NEVER get it!
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I wasn’t sure what to expect but I should have known this app would be as awful as the president I do not recommend this app to anyone
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: The worst app in the whole galaxy it just reeks racism from every corner of my screen when I click onto this horrible app it needs to be removed
attributes.title: Remove this app ASAP 🤮

attributes.review: this app was the worst thing i’ve ever seen and used. i don’t understand how it’s on the app stores it basically crashed my phone. i can’t believe it’s still on the app store take it off !!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP EW
